title: Reuters reveals U.S. says Russia oil price cap will not be aimed at OPEC
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively revealed that new steps from the Group of Seven countries to cap Russian oil sales at an enforced […]

The post Reuters reveals U.S. says Russia oil price cap will not be aimed at OPEC appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed that new steps from the Group of Seven countries to cap Russian oil sales at an enforced low price will not be replicated against OPEC producers, whose plans to cut output have irked consumer countries.

The post Reuters reveals U.S. says Russia oil price cap will not be aimed at OPEC appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
